message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $12,000 to you, and I believe it would greatly enhance your life or business. Considering its quality and the benefit it provides, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $13,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially save you thousands of dollars in the long run. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
